October 21, 2015, Adam was a client of Niklas’

"World-class recruiting" is the phrase that comes to mind when I think of Adam. I’ve had the pleasure of working with Adam for some time now. Like all excellent recruiters Adam is tremendously capable at finding and qualifying great talent, but what makes him unique is his ability to find you candidates who are a long-term cultural fit and who can achieve excellent results. And of course that he does it so naturally - both with a structured approach and with a great human touch – makes him really stand out. Adam receives my highest respect and he’ll earn yours too.

summary: VisionSpark is an executive search and training firm that helps companies make qualified and character-based hiring decisions for long-term cultural fit and bottom-line growth. Rooted with strong Midwestern values, we place high importance on people over process. We foster deep relationships with clients and build in-depth understanding of their business, culture and hire-to-retention ratios. Our approach to finding right-fit talent goes significantly deeper than traditional search firms and recruiters to ensure skills, personality, and cultural alignment, while delivering extraordinary results.
